title: VILLAGE / POSSE
description:
It's time to face your colleagues. 

This is the dialogue that autostarts once you step to the villlage square, the others just bark and stand there.

dialogueTree.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Look what the tide brought in," th..."
dialogueTree.text: "Look what the tide brought in," the man says in a measured tone. Suddenly, his expression changes and he tilts his head...

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""I wanna call you a teapot, but I'm..."
links.text: "I wanna call you a teapot, but I'm honestly kind of impressed... no idea where you got all that gear -- but there's no doubt in my mind that some bad, bad people are looking for it..."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Also, you look like a fucking idio..."
links.text: "Also, you look like a fucking idiot."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Whatever this is, it is completely..."
links.text: Whatever this is, it is completely unimportant compared to what you've just *seen*.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "This is the Man with Sunglasses fro..."
links.text: This is the Man with Sunglasses from the Whirling-in-Rags! But where are his sunglasses?

links.title: You: ""Wait... you're the Man with Sungla..."
links.text: "Wait... you're the Man with Sunglasses."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""That's right -- and you're some ki..."
links.text: "That's right -- and you're some kind of... murder machine."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Yes-yes... What's *wrong* with you?""
links.text: "Yes-yes... What's *wrong* with you?"

links.title: Empathy: "He's still *dwelling* on that jacke..."
links.text: He's still *dwelling* on that jacket.

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""That's right, and you look like yo..."
links.text: "That's right, and you look like you got twenty STDs."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""That's right, and you're some kind..."
links.text: "That's right, and you're some kind of a... urban scarecrow thing."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""That's right -- and you're bleedin..."
links.text: "That's right -- and you're bleeding."

links.title: You: ""Forget about all this, there's a g..."
links.text: "Forget about all this, there's a giant..."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""We're not forgetting about anythin..."
links.text: "We're not forgetting about anything -- look at you!" He points at you with both hands.

links.title: You: ""No one else seems bothered by my F..."
links.text: "No one else seems bothered by my FALN gear."

links.title: You: ""My jacket... no one else seems bot..."
links.text: "My jacket... no one else seems bothered by it..."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Harry, you're a cop with 'Pissf***..."
links.text: "Harry, you're a cop with 'Pissf****ts' on his back! Do you have any idea how hard the liberals are going to fuck us for this?"

links.title: Suggestion: "No, no, no! You've sensitivity test..."
links.text: No, no, no! You've sensitivity tested this!

links.title: You: ""Pissf****t. Singular.""
links.text: "Pissf****t. Singular."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Harry, there are probably pictures..."
links.text: "Harry, there are probably pictures..." The full gravity of the situation dawns on him.

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""They're going to fuck us to death.""
links.text: "They're going to fuck us to death."

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Yes," Trant Heidelstam says. "Ther..."
links.text: "Yes," Trant Heidelstam says. "There could have been cameras. This needs damage control."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There weren't any cameras around."..."
links.text: "There weren't any cameras around." He stares at his boots. "They don't have cameras..."

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno's liking this tense shit.""
links.text: "Cuno's liking this tense shit."

links.title: You: ""Don't worry, *many* people have se..."
links.text: "Don't worry, *many* people have seen me like this. No one said anything."

links.title: You: ""Okay, I see. Yes.""
links.text: "Okay, I see. Yes."

links.title: You: ""Yeah, fuck the world. No one else..."
links.text: "Yeah, fuck the world. No one else seems bothered by that."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Harry, that's because you're a cop..."
links.text: "Harry, that's because you're a cop with 'Fuck the World' written on his back."

links.title: Half Light: "Now that you start thinking about i..."
links.text: Now that you start thinking about it -- maybe they *were* afraid of you...

links.title: Empathy: "No one has been afraid of you witho..."
links.text: No one has been afraid of you without you knowing. They all felt perfectly safe.

links.title: You: ""I *know* when people are uncomfort..."
links.text: "I *know* when people are uncomfortable around me. They haven't been."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Believe me, they felt uncomfortabl..."
links.text: "Believe me, they felt uncomfortable."

links.title: Judit Minot: ""Vic, calm down...""
links.text: "Vic, calm down..."

links.title: You: ""Yes... I am a goddamn cop.""
links.text: "Yes... I am a goddamn cop."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Actually -- are you? Are you still..."
links.text: "Actually -- are you? Are you still a cop? There's so much disco going on, it's hard to tell."

links.title: You: ""Oh... that explains it.""
links.text: "Oh... that explains it."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Yes, that has *always* explained i..."
links.text: "Yes, that has *always* explained it."

links.title: Logic: "This is not the first time he's see..."
links.text: This is not the first time he's seen you all decked out in wacko.

links.title: Empathy: "Everyone felt perfectly safe in you..."
links.text: Everyone felt perfectly safe in your company. He doesn't know what he's talking about.

links.title: You: ""No one else seems bothered by my *..."
links.text: "No one else seems bothered by my *style*."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Bothered by it? Harry, you're a *g..."
links.text: "Bothered by it? Harry, you're a *goddamn* cop! They're afraid of you!"

links.title: You: ""The armour? No one else seems both..."
links.text: "The armour? No one else seems bothered by it."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Oh really?! They don't seem bother..."
links.text: "Oh really?! They don't seem bothered by it? That's because you're a cop in an exoskeleton!"

links.title: You: ""No one else seems bothered by the..."
links.text: "No one else seems bothered by the bleeding."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Bothered by it?! Harry, you look l..."
links.text: "Bothered by it?! Harry, you look like you need a fucking organ transplant!"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: "He takes a deep breath. "Fuck it, l..."
links.text: He takes a deep breath. "Fuck it, let's not get into that."

links.title: You: ""Cuno, you still have my back, righ..."
links.text: "Cuno, you still have my back, right?"

links.title: Cuno: ""We're all pigs here." He nods to y..."
links.text: "We're all pigs here." He nods to you, then straightens his back.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Even though we're all pigs here, yo..."
links.text: Even though we're all pigs here, you and Cuno are more pigs than the rest of the pigs. He'll have your back -- only later.

links.title: You: ""Who are you people?""
links.text: "Who are you people?"

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Hello, I'm Trant Heidelstam. I bel..."
links.text: "Hello, I'm Trant Heidelstam. I believe we've met on several occasions."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""I'm your goddamn *partner* Jean Vi..."
links.text: "I'm your goddamn *partner* Jean Vicquemare, and this is *your* special task force," he says, gesturing toward his companions. "Or what's left of it."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Special Consultant Trant Heidelsta..."
links.text: "Special Consultant Trant Heidelstam, Patrol Officer Judit Minot."

links.title: Judit Minot: ""Hi.""
links.text: "Hi."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""We've come to scrape what's left o..."
links.text: "We've come to scrape what's left of you off the pavement."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "The kid's about to say he's Cuno!"
links.text: The kid's about to say he's Cuno!

links.title: You: ""Wait..." (Elbow him in the ribs.)"
links.text: "Wait..." (Elbow him in the ribs.)

links.title: Cuno: ""Wait for fucking what? I'm Cuno. W..."
links.text: "Wait for fucking what? I'm Cuno. We come from Death Island."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "...aaaand he's said it."
links.text: ...aaaand he's said it.

links.title: You: "Let him."
links.text: Let him.

links.title: Cuno: ""Task force. Cool. I'm the Cuno. We..."
links.text: "Task force. Cool. I'm the Cuno. We just came from the fucking island." He points to the seafort behind him.

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Listen... Cuno." The man assesses..."
links.text: "Listen... Cuno." The man assesses the kid like a strike team leader about to kick in a door.

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Harrier and I are old friends... f..."
links.text: "Harrier and I are old friends... from way back. Mind letting us have a moment?"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Won't be long. I just need to talk..."
links.text: "Won't be long. I just need to talk to Harry about some of the things I think he's done wrong lately."

links.title: Cuno: ""Good luck with that." He turns to..."
links.text: "Good luck with that." He turns to you. "Sounds like you're in some shit."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Lieutenant Kim Kitsuragi, Precinct..."
links.text: "Lieutenant Kim Kitsuragi, Precinct 57. We've just come from the island..." He points to the seafort. "Where our investigation led us."

links.title: Rhetoric: "The scene is making even him feel a..."
links.text: The scene is making even him feel as though he has to justify your actions.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We might need your help with somet..."
links.text: "We might need your help with something later," he adds, suddenly regaining his confidence.

links.title: Authority: "As if he recalled that he's, in fac..."
links.text: As if he recalled that he's, in fact, a decorated police lieutenant, and not a naughty boy.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "The two aren't mutually exclusive."
links.text: The two aren't mutually exclusive.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But this is clearly a *departmenta..."
links.text: "But this is clearly a *departmental matter*, so I'm  going to leave you to discuss it among yourselves."

links.title: You: ""Thank you, lieutenant.""
links.text: "Thank you, lieutenant."

links.title: Judit Minot: ""It's good to meet you, Lieutenant..."
links.text: "It's good to meet you, Lieutenant Kitsuragi," she says warmly, flashing the lieutenant the tiniest of smiles.

links.title: Composure: "Letting the lieutenant know *he* sh..."
links.text: Letting the lieutenant know *he* shouldn't feel embarrassed over the shitstorm that's about to befall you.

links.title: You: ""Way to feed me to the wolves...""
links.text: "Way to feed me to the wolves..."

links.title: You: ""No, Kim, you've gotta have my back..."
links.text: "No, Kim, you've gotta have my back. Let's destroy them."

links.title: ...: "Harry recruited"
links.text: Harry recruited

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Absolutely no idea. A hundred years..."
links.text: Absolutely no idea. A hundred years?

links.title: Empathy: "Judging by the familiarity you feel..."
links.text: Judging by the familiarity you feel toward him -- two years minimum? Or maybe a short, but close stint on the task force...

links.title: Suggestion: "He's right. Don't start guessing. N..."
links.text: He's right. Don't start guessing. Now's not a good time.

links.title: You: ""What's a shitkid?""
links.text: "What's a shitkid?"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""You. *Shitkid* -- that's you.""
links.text: "You. *Shitkid* -- that's you."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Despite *all* that you've done -- t..."
links.text: Despite *all* that you've done -- the deserter, the phasmid, the case?!

links.title: You: ""Despite *all* that I've done?""
links.text: "Despite *all* that I've done?"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""No -- *because* of all that you've..."
links.text: "No -- *because* of all that you've done."

links.title: You: "Better not to piss him off by argui..."
links.text: Better not to piss him off by arguing.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Good idea. It doesn't look like he..."
links.text: Good idea. It doesn't look like he thinks you're in a position to correct him on the shitkid issue.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Maybe you've *deserved* it?"
links.text: Maybe you've *deserved* it?

links.title: You: ""How did you know I was here?""
links.text: "How did you know I was here?"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""The cafeteria manager you fucked o..."
links.text: "The cafeteria manager you fucked over told us where you went."

links.title: You: ""After all that Sylvie stuff, he be..."
links.text: "After all that Sylvie stuff, he betrays me..."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Shitkid," he says, shaking his ind..."
links.text: "Shitkid," he says, shaking his index finger, "he didn't *betray* you. He just told us the direction you went in. Who's Sylvie?"

links.title: You: ""Sylvie's a whore. She rides the co..."
links.text: "Sylvie's a whore. She rides the cock carousel... and foreigners."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Super," he says with a nod. "Whore..."
links.text: "Super," he says with a nod. "Whore. Foreigners. Hatred."

links.title: Judit Minot: ""Uhm, and..." she interjects, tryin..."
links.text: "Uhm, and..." she interjects, trying to defuse the situation. "People on this street helped us too."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""You're a legend among the drunks,..."
links.text: "You're a legend among the drunks, Harry. A legendary local *drunk*."

links.title: You: ""Sylvie's a girl I hooked Garte up..."
links.text: "Sylvie's a girl I hooked Garte up with. I did that *and* saved his establishment!"

links.title: You: ""No one. It's not important.""
links.text: "No one. It's not important."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""It better not be.""
links.text: "It better not be."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "He means: "You better not be *party..."
links.text: He means: "You better not be *partying* with this Sylvie, shitkid."

links.title: You: ""I saved his establishment and stil..."
links.text: "I saved his establishment and still he betrays me?!"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Strange. He didn't mention that. I..."
links.text: "Strange. He didn't mention that. In fact, the establishment didn't look saved at all -- there was a giant *aero-graffito* in front of the building. It was on fire."

links.title: You: ""It was this one junior delinquent.""
links.text: "It was this one junior delinquent."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""I don't know..." He squints at you..."
links.text: "I don't know..." He squints at you suspiciously. "It had *shitkid* written all over it."

links.title: You: ""Yeah, I wrote that. It was a poeti..."
links.text: "Yeah, I wrote that. It was a poetic gesture." (Lie.)

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""I knew it. Didn't I tell you, Tran..."
links.text: "I knew it. Didn't I tell you, Trant? I told you it was our shitkid."

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""The line is from Lu Jiatun's 'Miro..."
links.text: "The line is from Lu Jiatun's 'Mirova Cycle', isn't it? About Girl Child Communism -- the titular *returning* character. The ghostly apparition of..." He looks around and, noticing the impatience of his companions, stops himself. "Good choice, Harry."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "He is correct. It was the Seraise p..."
links.text: He is correct. It was the Seraise poet Lu Jiatun who in the Fifties of the last century composed a...

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Don't encourage him, Trant.""
links.text: "Don't encourage him, Trant."

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Okay.""
links.text: "Okay."

links.title: You: ""Yeah, I lit it on fire. It was a p..."
links.text: "Yeah, I lit it on fire. It was a poetic gesture."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""I knew it. Didn't I tell you, Tran..."
links.text: "I knew it. Didn't I tell you, Trant? I told you it was our shitkid."

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""The line is from Lu Jiatun's 'Miro..."
links.text: "The line is from Lu Jiatun's 'Mirova 82', isn't it? About Girl Child Communism -- the titular *returning* character. The ghostly apparition of..." He looks around and, noticing the impatience of his companions, stops himself. "Good choice, Harry."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Strange. He didn't mention that. I..."
links.text: "Strange. He didn't mention that. In fact, the establishment didn't look saved at all -- there was a giant *aero-graffito* in front of the building. Mixed with *blood*."

links.title: You: "(Turn to face the general direction..."
links.text: (Turn to face the general direction of the Whirling and yell.) "Damn you, cafeteria manager! You've betrayed me for the last time!"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Speaking of which. The giant *aero..."
links.text: "Speaking of which. The giant *aero-graffito* in front of the building. The one that's *burning* -- did you do that?"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Speaking of which. The giant *aero..."
links.text: "Speaking of which. The giant *aero-graffito* in front of his building, in red, government-marked fuel -- did you do that?"

links.title: You: ""I understand. Okay. Garte told you.""
links.text: "I understand. Okay. Garte told you."

links.title: Judit Minot: ""Uhm, and..." She looks around. "Pe..."
links.text: "Uhm, and..." She looks around. "People on this street helped us too. With your whereabouts."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""You're a legend among the drunks,..."
links.text: "You're a legend among the drunks, Harry. A legendary local *drunk*."

links.title: You: ""You aren't the Man with Sunglasses..."
links.text: "You aren't the Man with Sunglasses at all... you're not even blond!"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Guilty as charged." He exchanges a..."
links.text: "Guilty as charged." He exchanges a look with the special consultant. "I heard you'd lost your mind *and* your memory. I wanted to see if it was true."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""And it was. Good work, Harry. You'..."
links.text: "And it was. Good work, Harry. You're insane now. There's one less person for me -- and everyone else -- to rely on."

links.title: Rhetoric: "He was too sarcastic for you to rea..."
links.text: He was too sarcastic for you to realize who he was.

links.title: You: ""Actually, I suspected something wa..."
links.text: "Actually, I suspected something was off."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Did you? Or did you think I was a..."
links.text: "Did you? Or did you think I was a god damn FIREFIGHTER? We've been partners for how long, Harry?" He adjusts his tie. "Don't answer that -- you don't *remember*."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Did you? Or did you think I was a..."
links.text: "Did you? Or did you think I was a god damn MALE NURSE? We've been partners for how long, Harry?" He adjusts his tie. "Don't answer that -- you don't *remember*."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Did you? Or did you think I was a..."
links.text: "Did you? Or did you think I was a god damn ANIMAL HANDLER? We've been partners for how long, Harry?" He adjusts his tie. "Don't answer that -- you don't *remember*."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Did you?" He adjusts his tie. "Or..."
links.text: "Did you?" He adjusts his tie. "Or did you literally not recognize my face? We've been partners for how long, Harry? Don't answer that -- you don't *remember*."

links.title: You: ""Maybe if you hadn't been so *sarca..."
links.text: "Maybe if you hadn't been so *sarcastic*, I would have realized I knew you."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""I'm clinically depressed, Harry. S..."
links.text: "I'm clinically depressed, Harry. Sorry if I wasn't in the mood to butter you up after you told us to fuck off."

links.title: You: ""I don't like being lied to!""
links.text: "I don't like being lied to!"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""I didn't *lie* to you -- no one *l..."
links.text: "I didn't *lie* to you -- no one *lies* to you. You were so fucked up on booze you couldn't recognize your own partner."

links.title: You: ""Okay. I had that coming.""
links.text: "Okay. I had that coming."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Had *what* coming? Not recognizing..."
links.text: "Had *what* coming? Not recognizing people you work with *every* day?" He squints. "Brain damage?"

links.title: You: ""Have you been *spying* on me?""
links.text: "Have you been *spying* on me?"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Yes, I *was* spying on you. I was..."
links.text: "Yes, I *was* spying on you. I was in the bar, wearing a wig and stupid sunglasses. You didn't *recognize* me -- your own partner. Walked right past me..."

links.title: You: ""A disguise... why?""
links.text: "A disguise... why?"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""I heard you'd lost your mind *and*..."
links.text: "I heard you'd lost your mind *and* your memory. I wanted to see if it was true. And it is, Harry -- you're totally insane now. Good job."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""In the crowd, there was a man and..."
links.text: "In the crowd, there was a man and a woman in RCM uniform," he says to you, then turns to Vicquemare. "In his defence -- we were in a hurry."

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno knew dress-up-pigs were in to..."
links.text: "Cuno knew dress-up-pigs were in town. Cuno meant to dust them -- Cuno pig-duster -- but didn't, 'cause Cuno cares." The kid nods solemnly.

links.title: You: ""You! You never told me you're not..."
links.text: "You! You never told me you're not the Horse-Faced Woman!" (Point at her.)

links.title: Judit Minot: ""Lieutenant," she says with a heavy..."
links.text: "Lieutenant," she says with a heavy sigh. "My name is not 'Horse-Faced Woman'. It's Judit Minot. I was assigned to your unit two months ago. I thought we were friends..."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "You *know* what she means by 'frien..."
links.text: You *know* what she means by 'friends'. But ask, just to be sure.

links.title: You: ""We're still friends, I just have a..."
links.text: "We're still friends, I just have a stupid head."

links.title: Judit Minot: ""Okay." Another sigh. "Because you'..."
links.text: "Okay." Another sigh. "Because you're my commanding officer. I... I really want to respect you. I want us to have a normal relationship."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""That will never happen, Jude. He's..."
links.text: "That will never happen, Jude. He's the rudest man on Earth. He is the reason why the rest of us have to take sensitivity training. And I *hate* sensitivity training..."

links.title: You: ""Friends with... benefits?""
links.text: "Friends with... benefits?"

links.title: Judit Minot: ""No." She shakes her head. "Without..."
links.text: "No." She shakes her head. "Without *any* benefits."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""You fucking idiot. You stupid fuck..."
links.text: "You fucking idiot. You stupid fucking idiot. You're even worse than before. How is that even *possible*?"

links.title: Suggestion: "It's true. You have a problem."
links.text: It's true. You have a problem.

links.title: You: ""I'm truly sorry, Officer Minot.""
links.text: "I'm truly sorry, Officer Minot."

links.title: Judit Minot: ""Okay." Another sigh. "You're my co..."
links.text: "Okay." Another sigh. "You're my commanding officer. I... I really want to respect you. I want us to have a normal relationship."

links.title: You: ""Patrol Officer Minot, glad to make..."
links.text: "Patrol Officer Minot, glad to make the acquaintance. Let's put the past behind us."

links.title: Judit Minot: ""Right, sir." Her tone is suddenly..."
links.text: "Right, sir." Her tone is suddenly very cold.

links.title: You: ""You." (Nod to the female officer.)..."
links.text: "You." (Nod to the female officer.) "I'm sorry I didn't recognize you before."

links.title: Judit Minot: ""It's okay," she sighs. "I didn't c..."
links.text: "It's okay," she sighs. "I didn't come here to gloat, or to fool you. Neither did he, actually." She gestures toward Vicquemare. "We're just worried."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""That's right -- 'worried'. I'm alw..."
links.text: "That's right -- 'worried'. I'm always worried about you. Every time you don't show up to work, or when you do -- but *stink*."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""You're a *worry-fest*. She's worri..."
links.text: "You're a *worry-fest*. She's worried about you. I'm worried about you. Even Special Consultant Backpedal is worried about you. Everyone worries -- instead of *working*."

links.title: Rhetoric: "He's got a very, very solid case th..."
links.text: He's got a very, very solid case there. Actually, I've been trying to find a good moment to tell you...

links.title: You: "You're worried *too*?"
links.text: You're worried *too*?

links.title: Rhetoric: "Yes. You often sound like a brutal..."
links.text: Yes. You often sound like a brutal idiot.

links.title: You: "Fuck you too! I don't need help!"
links.text: Fuck you too! I don't need help!

links.title: Rhetoric: "Listen to yourself. You sound like..."
links.text: Listen to yourself. You sound like a brutal idiot. No matter what I do.

links.title: You: ""So *Trant Heidelstam* turns out to..."
links.text: "So *Trant Heidelstam* turns out to be... *Special Consultant Trant Heidelstam*..."

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Yes, I'm Trant Heidelstam. I never..."
links.text: "Yes, I'm Trant Heidelstam. I never said I wasn't Trant Heidelstam."

links.title: You: ""Wait, what was up with the kid the..."
links.text: "Wait, what was up with the kid then?"

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Mikael? Mikael's my son.""
links.text: "Mikael? Mikael's my son."

links.title: Half Light: "His son? What a joke... *Everyone*..."
links.text: His son? What a joke... *Everyone* is lying to you!

links.title: You: ""Oh yeah?! Where the fuck is your *..."
links.text: "Oh yeah?! Where the fuck is your *son* now, *special consultant*?!"

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""I sent him home," he responds calm..."
links.text: "I sent him home," he responds calmly. "Mikael is with his mother. We share custody."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""I told you. He's one drink away fr..."
links.text: "I told you. He's one drink away from killing someone."

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""I wouldn't... quite say that. But,..."
links.text: "I wouldn't... quite say that. But, yes, he is displaying aggression not atypical of late-stage alcoholism."

links.title: You: ""Oh yeah?! What was up with all the..."
links.text: "Oh yeah?! What was up with all the *interesting history*? Spying on me?"

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""No. I was just interested in the F..."
links.text: "No. I was just interested in the Feld building and the Martinaise Beachhead. And Mikael wanted to see Martinaise. It was a coincidence."

links.title: Empathy: "Him being there with his son -- it..."
links.text: Him being there with his son -- it was not a coincidence. It's difficult to see, but he was worried about you. And *also* interested in the Feld building.

links.title: You: ""Oh... okay. Sorry.""
links.text: "Oh... okay. Sorry."

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""No problem.""
links.text: "No problem."

links.title: You: ""So what are you *special consultin..."
links.text: "So what are you *special consulting* here?"

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""What indeed?" He looks at the dila..."
links.text: "What indeed?" He looks at the dilapidated shacks, then you. "I was asked to share my take on some of the more *obscure* theories developed in Königstein in the Thirties. Like -- partial psychotraumatic amnesia, group personality theory..."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""He's here to see if you're insane...."
links.text: "He's here to see if you're insane. He's smart. Let's move on."

links.title: You: ""Okay, you're Trant Heidelstam. Spe..."
links.text: "Okay, you're Trant Heidelstam. Special Consultant. I get it."

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Again..." He looks around. "I was..."
links.text: "Again..." He looks around. "I was asked to share my take on some of the more *fringe academic* theories developed in Königstein in the Thirties. For example -- partial psychotraumatic amnesia, group personality theory..."

links.title: You: ""So, *Trant Heidelstam*. What are y..."
links.text: "So, *Trant Heidelstam*. What are you *special consulting* here?"

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""What *am* I?" He taps his foot. "I..."
links.text: "What *am* I?" He taps his foot. "I was asked to share my take on some of the more *fringe academic* theories developed in Königstein in the Thirties. Regarding partial psychotraumatic amnesia. Group personality theory..."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""He's here to see if you're insane...."
links.text: "He's here to see if you're insane. He's smart. Let's move on."

links.title: You: ""Duped again! No one's who they say..."
links.text: "Duped again! No one's who they say they are!"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""*Duped*? Hey, here's a brilliant i..."
links.text: "*Duped*? Hey, here's a brilliant idea -- don't be a morbid drunk and you won't be duped so easily."

links.title: You: ""Gardener, scab leader, *this*..."..."
links.text: "Gardener, scab leader, *this*..." (Turn to the lieutenant.) "Tell me at least *you* are who you said you were!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. I'm still Kim Kitsuragi -- st..."
links.text: "Yes. I'm still Kim Kitsuragi -- still a lieutenant from Precinct 57."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Still caught up in this crossfire,..."
links.text: Still caught up in this crossfire, too...

links.title: Cuno: ""Fuck, pig..." The boy looks slight..."
links.text: "Fuck, pig..." The boy looks slightly uncomfortable. "The name's Kuuno, not *Cuno*. It's... lamer. My name's lamer than I said it was."

links.title: Cuno: "He looks repentant. "Just try not t..."
links.text: He looks repentant. "Just try not to shit yourself -- please."

links.title: You: ""It's the gardener situation all ov..."
links.text: "It's the gardener situation all over again..." (Turn to the lieutenant.) "Tell me at least *you* are who you said you were."

links.title: You: ""Okay. That... does have something..."
links.text: "Okay. That... does have something to do with it, yes."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""No. Everyone's just a brilliant ma..."
links.text: "No. Everyone's just a brilliant master of disguises."

links.title: You: ""You mentioned a 'task force'?""
links.text: "You mentioned a 'task force'?"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Yeah -- Major Crimes Unit, under L..."
links.text: "Yeah -- Major Crimes Unit, under Lieutenants Du Bois and Vicquemare -- ring any bells?"

links.title: You: ""Refresh my memory -- who *else* is..."
links.text: "Refresh my memory -- who *else* is in this?"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Refresh your memory? It's a god da..."
links.text: "Refresh your memory? It's a god damn Major Crimes Unit. There's you, me, Jude, Trant fucking Heidelstam, and Guillaume Bevy..." He stares at you.

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""I'm technically just a civilian ad..."
links.text: "I'm technically just a civilian advisor."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Fuck you, you're part of this shit..."
links.text: "Fuck you, you're part of this shit-show."

links.title: You: ""Yeah, um -- first, who's Guillaume..."
links.text: "Yeah, um -- first, who's Guillaume Bevy?"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Oh, that's an interesting story, a..."
links.text: "Oh, that's an interesting story, actually!" He's not smiling. "Guillaume Bevy is a police reporter who joined our team. He was really good. Then he left, because he lost faith in your ability to lead the unit."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Other people have left too. Good,..."
links.text: "Other people have left too. Good, smart people. People we won't get back. Only me and this *really patient* patrol officer are still here. And Trant -- because I'm *forcing* him to stay."

links.title: Logic: "Is this Guillaume Bevy blond and pa..."
links.text: Is this Guillaume Bevy blond and partial to sunglasses?

links.title: You: ""Is this Guillaume Bevy blond, with..."
links.text: "Is this Guillaume Bevy blond, with sunglasses? Like you were..."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""See -- there!" He wags his finger..."
links.text: "See -- there!" He wags his finger at you. "He's getting it! I was *impersonating* him. Look at me, I'm G-Bevy. It was going to be funny. But then you really did have brain damage -- so not so much anymore."

links.title: Empathy: "He sincerely thought it was going t..."
links.text: He sincerely thought it was going to be amusing. For both of you.

links.title: You: ""Okay. So what does the unit *do*?""
links.text: "Okay. So what does the unit *do*?"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Do? It's a Major Crimes Unit! We c..."
links.text: "Do? It's a Major Crimes Unit! We clear the desk of cases so Precinct 41 doesn't look like the worst station in town. We're *shit tier* now, Harry. Because of you."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "They're your posse. Or what remains..."
links.text: They're your posse. Or what remains of it. Hand-picked. Hand-lost.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The 41st isn't..." He trails off,..."
links.text: "The 41st isn't..." He trails off, not wishing to finish the sentence.

links.title: You: ""Yeah. Totally. I get it. Major Cri..."
links.text: "Yeah. Totally. I get it. Major Crimes Unit."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: "He looks at Minot. "He doesn't reme..."
links.text: He looks at Minot. "He doesn't remember."

links.title: Judit Minot: ""See? He really *doesn't* remember...."
links.text: "See? He really *doesn't* remember. It wasn't a 'sick joke' -- at least that's good."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Yeah, that's *very* good.""
links.text: "Yeah, that's *very* good."

links.title: You: ""Where have you *been* all this tim..."
links.text: "Where have you *been* all this time?"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Goddamnit, Harry..." He shifts his..."
links.text: "Goddamnit, Harry..." He shifts his weight, crosses his arms, and looks you in the eye.

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""You told us to fuck off. You said..."
links.text: "You told us to fuck off. You said we're *cramping your style*. You're *Detective God*. Fuck everything. All will burn. Detect or die!"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""And you were probably right too --..."
links.text: "And you were probably right too -- I would have never let you abduct a kid and take him on a creepy boat trip in the middle of fucking March!"

links.title: Cuno: ""You talking about Cuno?" He points..."
links.text: "You talking about Cuno?" He points to himself. "Major Cuno wasn't abducted, you fucking fat dink! Fuck outta here..."

links.title: You: ""Wait, so you let me face a squad o..."
links.text: "Wait, so you let me face a squad of trained killers alone just to teach me a lesson?"

links.title: Judit Minot: ""It wasn't like that...""
links.text: "It wasn't like that..."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Fuck you, Harry -- we didn't *know..."
links.text: "Fuck you, Harry -- we didn't *know* there was gonna be a tribunal, did we?"

links.title: You: ""All *will* burn, Satellite-Officer..."
links.text: "All *will* burn, Satellite-Officer Vicquemare. Make no mistake about it."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Here we go -- alcoholic delirium...."
links.text: "Here we go -- alcoholic delirium. *Visions*. All must pay..." He shakes his head.

links.title: You: ""Why didn't you detect or die then?""
links.text: "Why didn't you detect or die then?"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Oh, you think it was *cool* -- you..."
links.text: "Oh, you think it was *cool* -- you saying that? *Aesthetic* somehow? You were crying when we got here. Breaking things. You said we were going 'into the abyss'."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""None of us wanted to see the abyss..."
links.text: "None of us wanted to see the abyss, so we fucked off." He sighs. "Like you told us to."

links.title: You: ""Why would you leave a literal *Pol..."
links.text: "Why would you leave a literal *Police God*?"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""You were crying hysterically. You..."
links.text: "You were crying hysterically. You were drunk, breaking things, being emotionally abusive. You said we were going 'into the abyss'."

links.title: You: ""I said all those things? I'm not l..."
links.text: "I said all those things? I'm not like that anymore."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Sure..." he squints at you. "You'r..."
links.text: "Sure..." he squints at you. "You're not a... *superstar law official*. Talk on the town is you're Guillaume Le Million reincarnate. I know this shit. Nothing has changed."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Sure..." he squints at you. "Talk..."
links.text: "Sure..." he squints at you. "Talk on the town is you're the 'mouthpiece of the Gloaming.' Deranged apocalyptic rhetoric... Nothing has changed."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Yes. You're *sorry*. You're the so..."
links.text: "Yes. You're *sorry*. You're the sorriest cop who ever lived. Nothing has changed, Harry. I've heard this *repentance* shit a million times over."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Are you sure?" He squints at you...."
links.text: "Are you sure?" He squints at you. "So you haven't been telling everyone what a *boring cop* you are -- and that you should kill yourself? People say you've been out of your mind. I asked around."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Where have *we* been? We've been f..."
links.text: "Where have *we* been? We've been fucking off, as far as I remember." He crosses his arms.

links.title: You: ""None of this is ringing any bells...."
links.text: "None of this is ringing any bells..." (Move on.)

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""The *bells* aren't ringing because..."
links.text: "The *bells* aren't ringing because you have brain damage. Trant," he turns to the blond, "this is where you come in -- how bad is it?"

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Well... He doesn't have visible tr..."
links.text: "Well... He doesn't have visible tremors. He talks without slurring. He can drive a boat. He's standing, reasoning. All good signs. But -- complete retrograde amnesia, episodic *and* semantic..."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Meaning: you forgot both who you ar..."
links.text: Meaning: you forgot both who you are and the definitions of 'money,' 'isola,' 'pale,' and so on.

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""As displayed in the station call,..."
links.text: "As displayed in the station call, our interactions with him, and -- I don't want to be a 'snitch'," he makes air quotes, "but also mine with him before, when Harry did not seem to know who I was... It's all very interesting."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Interesting?""
links.text: "Interesting?"

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Yes. Interesting. I have my theori..."
links.text: "Yes. Interesting. I have my theories, but I would like to hear Harry's thoughts first. Harry," he turns to you, "what do *you* think happened to you? Neurologically? Psychologically? And -- why not -- *socioeconomically*?"

links.title: You: ""Wait, socioeconomically? You think..."
links.text: "Wait, socioeconomically? You think I'm so *poor* I lost my memory?"

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Not when you phrase it like that...."
links.text: "Not when you phrase it like that. But I don't think critical theory -- I know everyone thinks this is far-fetched, pink academia, but still -- I don't think it should be off the table here."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""What?! He lost his memory because..."
links.text: "What?! He lost his memory because of *capitalism*?"

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""No, not like that, I'm not talking..."
links.text: "No, not like that, I'm not talking Vredefort School here. But, Harry, I asked you -- what do *you* think happened?"

links.title: You: ""I drank so much I lost my memory...."
links.text: "I drank so much I lost my memory. And I'm now *slowly* recovering it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He is -- he's getting better. And..."
links.text: "He is -- he's getting better. And I can confirm that he drank a *lot* of alcohol prior to it happening."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""I believe he *drank*," he turns to..."
links.text: "I believe he *drank*," he turns to you. "People do that -- especially this one. What they don't do is forget their *whole life* because of drinking."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""I believe you *drank*. People do t..."
links.text: "I believe you *drank*. People do that -- you especially. What they don't do is forget their *whole life* because of drinking."

links.title: Judit Minot: ""But, Detective Vicquemare," she in..."
links.text: "But, Detective Vicquemare," she interjects. "He *has* blanked out before."

links.title: You: ""I have?""
links.text: "I have?"

links.title: Judit Minot: ""Yes, a couple of times. After some..."
links.text: "Yes, a couple of times. After some of the more... serious benders." She pauses, remembering. "One was after the Two Drunks case, the other when we looked into that mural."

links.title: Conceptualization: "So you don't *remember* not remembe..."
links.text: So you don't *remember* not remembering. Beautiful.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "The two cases... in your ledger. Th..."
links.text: The two cases... in your ledger. The Unsolvable Case and the Next World Mural. Those were recent.

links.title: Half Light: "Those cases were hard on you..."
links.text: Those cases were hard on you...

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Interesting. So at first he dipped..."
links.text: "Interesting. So at first he dipped his toes into it. Prepared. That's where he would have gotten the idea -- yes. Practice. And then he used alcohol to 'get there', so to speak..."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""What do you mean?""
links.text: "What do you mean?"

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Well -- here is my theory: What if..."
links.text: "Well -- here is my theory: What if this is an absolutely normal reaction to the world we're living in? What if this is *not* a significant anomaly at all, something to be explained, approached as a defect? Look at the sensory input here..." He gestures toward the scenery.

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Look at the ruins, the neon, liste..."
links.text: "Look at the ruins, the neon, listen to the radio, the multitudes. The people. Live here for forty years... As a police detective, he's like a magnetic reader on the world-tape -- to borrow a known metaphor. Harry's been pushed *flat against it*. Total input."

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Hard-wired to the free market..."..."
links.text: "Hard-wired to the free market..." He nods confidently. "He just needed for it to end."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Okay, Trant, thank you. That's abs..."
links.text: "Okay, Trant, thank you. That's absolutely meaningless. You really are a lefty dink. Will he or will he not be able to work in the Major Crimes Unit? Is he a cretin now? I want to know *that*."

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""He is *not* a cretin. And he *is*..."
links.text: "He is *not* a cretin. And he *is* able to do work -- if not in his previous leadership role, then as a line detective."

links.title: Authority: "Leadership -- now."
links.text: Leadership -- now.

links.title: You: ""I'm ready to lead again.""
links.text: "I'm ready to lead again."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""No one even *mentioned* that." He..."
links.text: "No one even *mentioned* that." He looks at you, then at Trant. "I misphrased my question. It should have been: Is he able to put his clothes on, and use the potty, or do we need to get him on a disability pension?"

links.title: Physical Instrument: "They can keep that pension, you're..."
links.text: They can keep that pension, you're rock solid. You can put your clothes on *hard*.

links.title: You: ""Line detective is good for now.""
links.text: "Line detective is good for now."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""For *now*?" He looks at you, then..."
links.text: "For *now*?" He looks at you, then at Trant. "I misphrased my question. It should have been: Is he able to put his clothes on, and use the potty, or do we need to get him on a disability pension?"

links.title: You: ""He's wrong. I'm too far gone for w..."
links.text: "He's wrong. I'm too far gone for work."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Agreed, Harry." He nods. "Just don..."
links.text: "Agreed, Harry." He nods. "Just don't expect us to get you a disability pension. Cops who actually gave a shit are waiting in line. You're not gonna hog their seat."

links.title: You: ""Fuck all of you, I don't *want* to..."
links.text: "Fuck all of you, I don't *want* to be in your unit."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""No, Harry -- FUCK YOU. You already..."
links.text: "No, Harry -- FUCK YOU. You already fucked us -- I've already explained this shit to Pryce *twice*. To Berdyayeva -- *four times*. I'm your partner. I answer for you when you're not there."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "When you clocked out, *I* became re..."
links.text: When you clocked out, *I* became responsible for your cases -- and your special task force.

links.title: You: ""What now?" (Proceed.)"
links.text: "What now?" (Proceed.)

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Now nothing. Now we're just going..."
links.text: "Now nothing. Now we're just going to stand here."

links.title: You: ""Really?""
links.text: "Really?"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""No -- now we discuss THAT." He poi..."
links.text: "No -- now we discuss THAT." He points to the water. "What the fuck did you do to our motor carriage?! Why is it *there*, Harry?"

links.title: Drama: "Lie. Just -- bide your time, ask so..."
links.text: Lie. Just -- bide your time, ask something. Then lie.

links.title: You: ""Wait, there's a motor carriage in..."
links.text: "Wait, there's a motor carriage in the ocean?"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Yes. *Your* motor carriage. White..."
links.text: "Yes. *Your* motor carriage. White and blue. Under the sea. With fish and clams and other sea-shit."

links.title: Perception (Sight): "Now that you look where he's pointi..."
links.text: Now that you look where he's pointing -- to the northeast -- then yes. There does seem to be a motor carriage in the ocean. Strange. How did it get there?

links.title: You: ""Hold on, in the ocean?" (Feign ign..."
links.text: "Hold on, in the ocean?" (Feign ignorance.)

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Yes. In the ocean. Under the sea...."
links.text: "Yes. In the ocean. Under the sea. Our work vehicle -- with fish and clams and other sea-shit."

links.title: You: ""It was stolen by Jacob Irw.""
links.text: "It was stolen by Jacob Irw."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Jacob Irw?""
links.text: "Jacob Irw?"

links.title: You: ""The famous TipTop Tournée driver.""
links.text: "The famous TipTop Tournée driver."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""I *know* who Jacob Irw is. I wante..."
links.text: "I *know* who Jacob Irw is. I wanted to give you a chance to stop *fucking* me. How naive of me. You drove a 45,000 reál police vehicle into the ocean -- what did I expect?"

links.title: You: ""That wasn't me. It was stolen by t..."
links.text: "That wasn't me. It was stolen by traffic hooligans."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Oh -- well, if it wasn't *you* the..."
links.text: "Oh -- well, if it wasn't *you* then it's okay. You only let someone *steal* our 45,000 reál police vehicle, drive it into the sea -- and then just *left* it there."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""For the record, you pressured us i..."
links.text: "For the record, you pressured us into getting it. 'It'll be cool Jean, we'll have wheels, rapid response...' I was fine being an equestrian cop. I hope you're fine driving a *bicycle*."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Don't answer that." He exhales to..."
links.text: "Don't answer that." He exhales to calm his breathing. "Your badge, Harry. Show me your badge."

links.title: You: ""I drove it into the ocean when I w..."
links.text: "I drove it into the ocean when I was drunk."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""So *refreshing*. He just admits it..."
links.text: "So *refreshing*. He just admits it. Thank you for your honesty. Thank you for destroying 45,000 reál of police property that's coming out of *everyone's* payslip."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""It doesn't matter." He exhales to..."
links.text: "It doesn't matter." He exhales to calm his breathing. "Your badge, Harry. Show me your badge."

links.title: You: ""Wait, my badge?""
links.text: "Wait, my badge?"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""The thing that tells people you're..."
links.text: "The thing that tells people you're a police officer."

links.title: You: ""I got my badge right here." (Show..."
links.text: "I got my badge right here." (Show it to them.)

links.title: Interfacing: "In a rush to demonstrate your badge..."
links.text: In a rush to demonstrate your badge, your eager fingers can't sustain a grip on the smooth plastic, and the badge slips out of your hand.

links.title: You: "Catch it!"
links.text: Catch it!

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Not today, badge."
links.text: Not today, badge.

links.title: You: "Did I get the badge?"
links.text: Did I get the badge?

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "You got it all right! You're showin..."
links.text: You got it all right! You're showing it to him, victorious. They're *seeing* the badge.

links.title: You: ""Behold, my badge!""
links.text: "Behold, my badge!"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""And your gun?" he asks, unimpresse..."
links.text: "And your gun?" he asks, unimpressed by the piece of plastic in your hand.

links.title: You: "The drama is unnecessary, I got the..."
links.text: The drama is unnecessary, I got the badge, all is well.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "You juggle the badge for a second,..."
links.text: You juggle the badge for a second, unsuccessfully, and it lands on the ground some two metres away.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Ouch, you strained your elbow tryin..."
links.text: Ouch, you strained your elbow trying to catch that stupid thing... dammit.

links.title: Judit Minot: ""He found it!" The patrol officer p..."
links.text: "He found it!" The patrol officer picks it up and gives it back to you -- slippery and cold. "He found it, Jean. It's his badge!"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""And your *gun*?" The man stares at..."
links.text: "And your *gun*?" The man stares at you, unimpressed.

links.title: You: "Let it fall to the ground."
links.text: Let it fall to the ground.

links.title: Judit Minot: "Patrol Officer Minot picks it up an..."
links.text: Patrol Officer Minot picks it up and gives it back to you -- slippery and cold.

links.title: Judit Minot: ""He found it. It's his badge. I can..."
links.text: "He found it. It's his badge. I can confirm."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""And your *gun*?" The man stares at..."
links.text: "And your *gun*?" The man stares at you, unimpressed with the badge-finding.

links.title: Rhetoric: "As if having your badge *and* gun a..."
links.text: As if having your badge *and* gun are natural states, not achievements.

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: "He squints at it suspiciously."
links.text: He squints at it suspiciously.

links.title: Drama: "Trying to ascertain if it's not a b..."
links.text: Trying to ascertain if it's not a blue candy wrapper or a piece of vinyl.

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Okay." Finally, he nods, unimpress..."
links.text: "Okay." Finally, he nods, unimpressed. "And your *gun*?"

links.title: Conceptualization: "What is it with all these *material..."
links.text: What is it with all these *material objects*?!

links.title: Authority: "Here we go again! "Lost gun, lost g..."
links.text: Here we go again! "Lost gun, lost gun" -- trying to terrorize you!

links.title: Conceptualization: "Gun? Yeah, you don't have that. May..."
links.text: Gun? Yeah, you don't have that. Maybe you can *philosophize* your way out of it?

links.title: You: ""I lost it. I haven't found it yet.""
links.text: "I lost it. I haven't found it yet."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""He doesn't have it..." He points t..."
links.text: "He doesn't have it..." He points to the sea. "Here's an idea. Maybe you could look in the mother fucking motor carriage you drove into the sea? Maybe LOOK THERE?!"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Fuck it. I'll get it myself, just..."
links.text: "Fuck it. I'll get it myself, just tell me you have your *gun*." He collects himself again -- dusts off his black suit, although it's completely clean.

links.title: You: ""Gun. Gun..." (Just repeat *gun*.)"
links.text: "Gun. Gun..." (Just repeat *gun*.)

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Yeah -- gun. The thing that was gi..."
links.text: "Yeah -- gun. The thing that was given to you to *kill people*."

links.title: You: ""Wait, *how* did you know I lost my..."
links.text: "Wait, *how* did you know I lost my gun?"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""You lost your fucking gun!?" He lo..."
links.text: "You lost your fucking gun!?" He looks around. "I knew it. I knew he lost it. Didn't I tell you? I told you he lost his gun too."

links.title: Rhetoric: "You may have accidentally admitted..."
links.text: You may have accidentally admitted to losing it. Just now.

links.title: Judit Minot: ""This isn't cause for celebration...."
links.text: "This isn't cause for celebration. It's... bad."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""I would say it's *very* bad, yes."..."
links.text: "I would say it's *very* bad, yes." He turns to you. "You lost your service weapon -- while drunk. And then you couldn't find it, because you were *still* drunk?! You're drunk right now, aren't you?"

links.title: You: ""My gun is right here!" (Show him t..."
links.text: "My gun is right here!" (Show him the Villiers 9mm.)

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Whooh. He has it -- *and* he didn'..."
links.text: "Whooh. He has it -- *and* he didn't drop it." He wipes his brow in mock relief. "You're drunk like a bum, Harry. Put that thing away before you kill someone."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Whooh. He has it -- I thought it w..."
links.text: "Whooh. He has it -- I thought it was in the ocean..." He wipes his brow in mock relief. "You're drunk like a bum, Harry. Put that thing away before you kill someone."

links.title: You: ""I have a new gun now." (Present Ru..."
links.text: "I have a new gun now." (Present Ruby's gun.)

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""I don't care if you have a *new gu..."
links.text: "I don't care if you have a *new gun*, I only care about your *old gun*. Your official sidearm. You lost it, didn't you?"

links.title: You: ""Yeah yeah, I got that too." (Show..."
links.text: "Yeah yeah, I got that too." (Show him the boring sidearm.)

links.title: You: ""I don't have that. I don't have th..."
links.text: "I don't have that. I don't have the sidearm."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""I *knew* it. I told you he wouldn'..."
links.text: "I *knew* it. I told you he wouldn't have it."

links.title: Judit Minot: ""This isn't cause for celebration...."
links.text: "This isn't cause for celebration. It's... bad."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""I would say it's *very* bad, yes."..."
links.text: "I would say it's *very* bad, yes." He turns to you. "You're drunk like an asshole, Harry -- please put the stolen firearm away before you kill someone."

links.title: You: ""This is a *great* gun. Maybe it's..."
links.text: "This is a *great* gun. Maybe it's not some kind of flashy *side* arm, but still!"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""I don't care. Where is the gun the..."
links.text: "I don't care. Where is the gun the RCM gave you to kill people with? Where is that one?"

links.title: You: ""I upgraded my gun to a rifle." (Pr..."
links.text: "I upgraded my gun to a rifle." (Present the Triangong 4.46 rifle.)

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""*Upgraded it*? I don't care about..."
links.text: "*Upgraded it*? I don't care about your weapon-mania, Harry. I only care about your official sidearm -- which you *lost*."

links.title: You: ""Okay, I got that too." (Show him t..."
links.text: "Okay, I got that too." (Show him the boring sidearm.)

links.title: You: ""Yeah, I don't have that. I don't h..."
links.text: "Yeah, I don't have that. I don't have my sidearm."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""I knew it! I told you he didn't ha..."
links.text: "I knew it! I told you he didn't have it."

links.title: Judit Minot: ""This isn't cause for celebration...."
links.text: "This isn't cause for celebration. It's... bad."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Oh, I would say it's *very* bad."..."
links.text: "Oh, I would say it's *very* bad." He turns to you. "You're drunk like a bum, Harry. Please put the stolen rifle away before you kill someone."

links.title: You: ""Yeah, I don't have that. I don't h..."
links.text: "Yeah, I don't have that. I don't have my sidearm." (Lie.)

links.title: You: ""This is a Triangong 4.46! It was u..."
links.text: "This is a Triangong 4.46! It was used to kill a man from nearly a kilometre away."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""I don't care. Where is the gun the..."
links.text: "I don't care. Where is the gun the RCM gave you to kill people with? Where is that one?"

links.title: You: ""Gun? Behold *all* my guns. If anyt..."
links.text: "Gun? Behold *all* my guns. If anything, I need more *hands*!" (Show him your two pistols and two rifles.)

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""I don't care about your collection..."
links.text: "I don't care about your collection, you hoarding freak." He waves your arsenal away without looking. "Is one of them your service weapon? I only want to know about that *one* gun."

links.title: You: ""Yeah, yeah, I got that." (Show him..."
links.text: "Yeah, yeah, I got that." (Show him the boring sidearm.)

links.title: You: ""I don't have that one. I don't hav..."
links.text: "I don't have that one. I don't have my sidearm." (Lie.)

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""I *knew* it. I told you he wouldn'..."
links.text: "I *knew* it. I told you he wouldn't have it."

links.title: Judit Minot: ""This isn't cause for celebration...."
links.text: "This isn't cause for celebration. It's... bad."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Oh, I would say it's *very* bad."..."
links.text: "Oh, I would say it's *very* bad." He turns to you. "You're drunk like a bum, Harry. Please put the gun collection away before you kill someone."

links.title: You: ""What?! These are *great* guns. Sup..."
links.text: "What?! These are *great* guns. Superior to my sidearm any day."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Shut up! Show me your sidearm, or..."
links.text: "Shut up! Show me your sidearm, or fuck off."

links.title: You: ""I found my gun, but then I realize..."
links.text: "I found my gun, but then I realized I didn't need it, so I left it behind."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Are you drunk right now? You're dr..."
links.text: "Are you drunk right now? You're drunk right now, aren't you, you fucking *bum*. I can smell it!"

links.title: You: ""I lost my gun. And I didn't find i..."
links.text: "I lost my gun. And I didn't find it. It's gone."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Did you check the local pawnshop?..."
links.text: "Did you check the local pawnshop? Because *I* did  -- and you're not gonna believe it, but you sold the pawnbroker a Villiers 9mm pistol -- to pay for booze!"

links.title: You: ""I'm on it. 24/7. I'm tracking it d..."
links.text: "I'm on it. 24/7. I'm tracking it down *right now*."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""But you haven't -- because you're..."
links.text: "But you haven't -- because you're *drunk*. You lost your gun -- and you're drunk. You're a drunk, gunless bum! I can smell it."

links.title: You: ""Gun? Badge? Car? These are all *th..."
links.text: "Gun? Badge? Car? These are all *things*. Things don't matter. People do."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""You're *drunk*, aren't you? You lo..."
links.text: "You're *drunk*, aren't you? You lost your gun and you're drunk! You're a drunk, gunless bum! I can smell it!"

links.title: You: ""Lost gun, lost gun! I won't be *te..."
links.text: "Lost gun, lost gun! I won't be *terrorized* with this lost gun shit anymore."

links.title: You: ""I lost it. I haven't found it yet...."
links.text: "I lost it. I haven't found it yet." (Lie.)

links.title: You: ""What I *do* have is this futuristi..."
links.text: "What I *do* have is this futuristic armour." (Point to yourself.)

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""We're not armour-cops, we're cop-c..."
links.text: "We're not armour-cops, we're cop-cops! People don't know us by our armour, they know us by our badges. Where the fuck is your badge?"

links.title: You: ""I thought the killer would be unde..."
links.text: "I thought the killer would be underwater. He wasn't."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Ha-ha-ha, ho-ho-ho." He grabs his..."
links.text: "Ha-ha-ha, ho-ho-ho." He grabs his stomach in mirthless laughter. "Underwater killer. So funny, Harry. Thank you for fucking me."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Thank you for destroying 45,000 re..."
links.text: "Thank you for destroying 45,000 reál of police property that's coming out of *my* payslip. You know that, right? You're gonna get fired. And I'm gonna pay till I die..."

links.title: You: ""The time had come. Tequila Sunset.""
links.text: "The time had come. Tequila Sunset."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Ha-ha-ha, ho-ho-ho." He grabs his..."
links.text: "Ha-ha-ha, ho-ho-ho." He grabs his stomach in mirthless laughter. "Tequila Sunset -- not Sunrise, because you're almost dead. So funny, Harry. Thank you for fucking me."

links.title: You: ""I don't know. I don't know what it..."
links.text: "I don't know. I don't know what it's doing there."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""I do. You drove it into the water...."
links.text: "I do. You drove it into the water. Everyone on this street saw you do it. It's going to be a local landmark too -- on the brochure. Thank you for fucking us, Harry."

links.title: You: "Just stand there."
links.text: Just stand there.

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Yeah, yeah. Just stand there. It's..."
links.text: "Yeah, yeah. Just stand there. It's cool."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Okay, Trant, thank you. That's......"
links.text: "Okay, Trant, thank you. That's... absolutely meaningless. I'm glad we brought you. Will he or will he not be able to work in the Major Crimes Unit? Is he a cretin now? I want to know *that*."

links.title: You: ""I made it all up. It was a fantasy..."
links.text: "I made it all up. It was a fantasy, a stupid joke. I know what I am."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""And what is that?""
links.text: "And what is that?"

links.title: You: ""A drunk and a loser.""
links.text: "A drunk and a loser."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That is what I thought -- at first..."
links.text: "That is what I thought -- at first. That it was a fantasy. But... I've seen him work. It's not. He really is experiencing something out of the ordinary. He really does not remember."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Lieutenant, I'm sorry, but you've..."
links.text: "Lieutenant, I'm sorry, but you've been *bewitched by the shitkid*. It happens. I know it's hard to accept, but he made it all up -- because he's a psychopath. It's a simple explanation."

links.title: Judit Minot: ""Detective Vicquemare... he *has* b..."
links.text: "Detective Vicquemare... he *has* blacked out before. We should take this seriously."

links.title: Cuno: ""Pig's lying. He's clearly got some..."
links.text: "Pig's lying. He's clearly got something real fucked up going on up in here." He twists his index finger at his temple.

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Got that right, kid -- he's a psyc..."
links.text: "Got that right, kid -- he's a psychopath, and he made up this whole amnesia story to fuck with us."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""I can believe that. Shitkid made i..."
links.text: "I can believe that. Shitkid made it all up to fuck with us -- because he's a psychopath. This is typical Harry behaviour. A sick joke. I told you, Jude."

links.title: You: ""A heartbroken drudge.""
links.text: "A heartbroken drudge."

links.title: You: ""A police detective.""
links.text: "A police detective."

links.title: You: ""It might have something to do with..."
links.text: "It might have something to do with an anomaly in the church. A two-millimetre hole in the world."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Corresponding to the twenty-centim..."
links.text: "Corresponding to the twenty-centimetre hole in your brain? Sure. This theory has great symmetry. I see how it folds into itself neatly."

links.title: Inland Empire: "Precisely, Satellite-Officer Vicque..."
links.text: Precisely, Satellite-Officer Vicquemare. It's Martinaise.

links.title: You: ""Take this seriously. I suspect the..."
links.text: "Take this seriously. I suspect there might be something wrong with Martinaise."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This sounds odd -- but I was there..."
links.text: "This sounds odd -- but I was there. The church on the coast was shaking from an audio-spatial anomaly. It may have been entroponetic, or perhaps related to radio waves..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Either way, it was real. I've even..."
links.text: "Either way, it was real. I've even put it in my report -- you should read it. I do not, however, think it has anything to do with him drinking himself to the point of brain damage."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Thank you, Lieutenant Kitsuragi. J..."
links.text: "Thank you, Lieutenant Kitsuragi. Just to clarify -- I do not think isolary entroponetics are a hoax. Pale produces global phenomena -- it's proven. However..."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""...what has *not* been proven is t..."
links.text: "...what has *not* been proven is total memory loss after drinking too much Commodore Red. Honestly, I think he's just lying to us."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Yes-yes. Anomaly. Look, I get it...."
links.text: "Yes-yes. Anomaly. Look, I get it. In your delirium you came up with an *entroponetic* explanation for why you're such an insane drunk. And I understand."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""I've been there: Perhaps it's *not..."
links.text: "I've been there: Perhaps it's *not* because he's a petulant teenager in a 40-year-old man's body. Perhaps it's pale-related? Perhaps it's extraphysical?"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Or perhaps it can be cured with me..."
links.text: "Or perhaps it can be cured with mesmerism? But then I think: No, that's unlikely. He's probably just an *asshole*. A drunk asshole who *pretends* to have amnesia to get out of shit."

links.title: Rhetoric: "If you investigated further, you --..."
links.text: If you investigated further, you -- or Kim -- would have more to say. But you didn't, so here we are.

links.title: Rhetoric: "If you investigated further, you wo..."
links.text: If you investigated further, you would have more to say. But you didn't. So here we are.

links.title: You: ""I'll explain later, but there's an..."
links.text: "I'll explain later, but there's another man who's lost his memory. A *crab-man*."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""*Crab-man* is an unfortunate choic..."
links.text: "*Crab-man* is an unfortunate choice of words -- but I was there. The church on the coast shook from an audio-spatial anomaly. It may have been entroponetic, or perhaps related to radio waves..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Either way, I have put this into m..."
links.text: "Either way, I have put this into my report -- you should read it. I do not, however, think it has anything to do with him drinking himself to the point of brain damage."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Crab-man... Look, I get it. In you..."
links.text: "Crab-man... Look, I get it. In your delirium you came up with an *entroponetic* explanation for why you're such an insane drunk."

links.title: You: ""I knew you would be too closed-min..."
links.text: "I knew you would be too closed-minded to understand *the anomaly*."

links.title: You: ""I am a highly experimental detecti..."
links.text: "I am a highly experimental detective. This was a method I used to solve the case."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Son of fucking Lung here! Detectiv..."
links.text: "Son of fucking Lung here! Detective Far Out Son of Lung on the case!"

links.title: You: ""Who's Son of Lung?""
links.text: "Who's Son of Lung?"

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""It's an urban myth -- a police det..."
links.text: "It's an urban myth -- a police detective who employs highly experimental investigative techniques. It's a *cultural* reference, detective."

links.title: You: ""Is it really so hard to believe?""
links.text: "Is it really so hard to believe?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He *did* present this theory to me..."
links.text: "He *did* present this theory to me -- once before. I had trouble believing it then, but he seems to be convinced. And I've seen him work. His methods are... unorthodox."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""With all due respect, lieutenant -..."
links.text: "With all due respect, lieutenant -- you're *bewitched by the shitkid*. It happens. What doesn't happen is a cop wiping his own memory to solve a case."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""In fact, it's not possible to wipe..."
links.text: "In fact, it's not possible to wipe one's memory -- at all. Even with the amount of Potent Pilsner he downs every *hour*. He's simply lying. Or insane. Or both."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He *has* hinted at the possibility..."
links.text: "He *has* hinted at the possibility before. I have trouble believing him, of course, but he seems to want to convince himself of it. And I've seen him work. His methods are... unorthodox."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Yes. It's really, really hard to b..."
links.text: "Yes. It's really, really hard to believe. Because it's *idiotic* and *not true*. It's not possible to wipe your own memory. Even with the amount of *Potent Pilsner* you down every *hour*."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""You're simply lying. Or insane. Or..."
links.text: "You're simply lying. Or insane. Or both."

links.title: Judit Minot: ""Detective Vicquemare... I'm not sa..."
links.text: "Detective Vicquemare... I'm not saying he's the Son of Lung. But lying? I mean -- he *has* blacked out before..."

links.title: You: ""I have accomplished things no norm..."
links.text: "I have accomplished things no normal detective ever has. I have detected a..."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Shut up! You didn't wipe your own..."
links.text: "Shut up! You didn't wipe your own memory. We're not even *considering* that option. It's not possible. Even with the amount of *Potent Pilsner* you down every *hour*."

links.title: You: ""This is all *pointless*. I have co..."
links.text: "This is all *pointless*. I have completely TRANSCENDED all of this. You have no idea what I just saw!"

links.title: You: ""Something so sad happened to me th..."
links.text: "Something so sad happened to me that I couldn't be me anymore. It was a defence mechanism."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Psychotraumatic amnesia? Trant?" H..."
links.text: "Psychotraumatic amnesia? Trant?" He turns to the special consultant. "I can go for that -- shitkid is a broken man, always has been. Who isn't? I know I am. But you know what?"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: "He turns back to you. "I keep my sh..."
links.text: He turns back to you. "I keep my shit together. Also, I *know* a person can't wipe their own mind -- however traumatic it gets. That doesn't happen. You're lying. Or insane. Or both."

links.title: You: ""Capitalism. Capitalism fucked me b..."
links.text: "Capitalism. Capitalism fucked me beyond all recognition. Trant is right."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Look at F. Booho here! Victim of t..."
links.text: "Look at F. Booho here! Victim of the ethanol-industrial complex. What are you, an inva-communist now? You think this is a joke?"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: "He turns to the special consultant...."
links.text: He turns to the special consultant. "Asking him was a mistake -- he's a teenage psycho. I asked *you*. It's not possible to wipe your own memory with alcohol alone, right? He's either lying or insane."

links.title: You: ""Well it's *not* capitalism. So we..."
links.text: "Well it's *not* capitalism. So we can cross that off the list, you lefty dink."

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Lefty dink? Well, actually -- I do..."
links.text: "Lefty dink? Well, actually -- I don't consider myself a classical leftist at all. Not in the Mazovian sense at least. But, fine -- theory aside, what happened?"

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""As displayed in your interactions..."
links.text: "As displayed in your interactions with him here and previously, at the bar, and -- I don't want to be a 'snitch'," he makes air quotes, "but also mine with him before, when Harry did not seem to know who I was... It's all very interesting."

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""As displayed in our interactions w..."
links.text: "As displayed in our interactions with him here, and also his interactions with the locals, where he did not remember being a law official... It's all very interesting."

links.title: ...: "Harry left behind"
links.text: Harry left behind

links.title: You: ""I may have pawned it... anyway, it..."
links.text: "I may have pawned it... anyway, it's gone now."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Yeah, I checked the local pawnshop..."
links.text: "Yeah, I checked the local pawnshop. You sold the pawnbroker a Villiers 9mm pistol -- to pay for booze!"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""It *worked* too, didn't it? You're..."
links.text: "It *worked* too, didn't it? You're drunk right now, aren't you? You fucking bum, I can smell it all the way over here!"

links.title: Cuno: ""Wow, you're being brutalized... Pi..."
links.text: "Wow, you're being brutalized... Pig on pig violence."

links.title: You: ""I didn't lose my gun, I have my gu..."
links.text: "I didn't lose my gun, I have my gun!" (Show him the gun.)

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""We're not talking about the fuckin..."
links.text: "We're not talking about the fucking gun anymore -- we're talking about the *vaporized cloud* of ethanol coming from your mouth."

links.title: Rhetoric: "This is so unfair. He knows you hav..."
links.text: This is so unfair. He knows you have the gun and *still* he's punishing you.

links.title: You: ""So it doesn't even matter that I f..."
links.text: "So it doesn't even matter that I found my gun?!"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""You were never supposed to lose it..."
links.text: "You were never supposed to lose it in the first place. *Not lost* is your gun's *natural state*, you drunk bum."

links.title: You: ""I'm not drunk. I haven't started d..."
links.text: "I'm not drunk. I haven't started drinking again!" (Lie.)

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""So you... *forgot* to drink? I don..."
links.text: "So you... *forgot* to drink? I don't buy it. Why do you smell like a *corpse* then?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He's wounded." He looks at you. "I..."
links.text: "He's wounded." He looks at you. "It's been a long week."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He's wounded." He looks at you. "I..."
links.text: "He's wounded." He looks at you. "It's been a long week -- and he's handled an actual corpse."

links.title: Cuno: ""Aw, c'mon, you gotta cut him some..."
links.text: "Aw, c'mon, you gotta cut him some slack. Pig's been working hard. Digging through the guts of corpses and shit. Getting shot and shit."

links.title: You: ""Wait, what smell?! I didn't even g..."
links.text: "Wait, what smell?! I didn't even get close to the damn corpse and I *still* solved the case. That's how good I am."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: "From the way he covers his nose you..."
links.text: From the way he covers his nose you can tell the satellite-officer is still fixated on the smell and not your incredible achievement.

links.title: You: ""Hold on, I just haven't washed mys..."
links.text: "Hold on, I just haven't washed myself after the autopsy..."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: "Without a reply the satellite-offic..."
links.text: Without a reply the satellite-officer covers his nose.

links.title: You: ""No idea *what* you're smelling. I..."
links.text: "No idea *what* you're smelling. I washed death off me."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: "The man doesn't reply, but his expr..."
links.text: The man doesn't reply, but his expression speaks for him.

links.title: Composure: "'You should've done a better job' i..."
links.text: 'You should've done a better job' is what it's saying.

links.title: You: ""Wait, it may be because of the *ph..."
links.text: "Wait, it may be because of the *pheromone*."

links.title: Judit Minot: ""Detective -- please. Don't start t..."
links.text: "Detective -- please. Don't start talking about your *pheromones* again. This is serious. If you don't..." She doesn't finish the sentence.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Then you'll be fired. This is a hea..."
links.text: Then you'll be fired. This is a hearing -- toughen up.

links.title: You: ""I've handled an actual corpse.""
links.text: "I've handled an actual corpse."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""I don't believe you." He squints...."
links.text: "I don't believe you." He squints. "You're drunk. You let a suspect *escape* -- a certain Klaasje. Because you were you too *drunk* to assess her flight risk."

links.title: Judit Minot: ""We've read the reports, Harry. Lie..."
links.text: "We've read the reports, Harry. Lieutenant Kitsuragi's. We know."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""I don't believe you." He squints...."
links.text: "I don't believe you." He squints. "You're drunk. You let a suspect *escape* -- a certain Ruby. Because you were too *drunk* to take her in."

links.title: Judit Minot: ""We've read the reports, Harry. Lie..."
links.text: "We've read the reports, Harry. Lieutenant Kitsuragi's. We know."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""I don't believe you." He squints...."
links.text: "I don't believe you." He squints. "You're drunk. You made a suspect shoot herself in the head. You went in drunk and *intimidated* her."

links.title: Judit Minot: ""We've read the reports, Harry. Lie..."
links.text: "We've read the reports, Harry. Lieutenant Kitsuragi's. We know."

links.title: You: ""I'm sorry I smell bad. It's been a..."
links.text: "I'm sorry I smell bad. It's been a bit of a week."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""A bit of a week?" He squints. "You..."
links.text: "A bit of a week?" He squints. "You're drunk. And you let a suspect *escape* -- a certain Klaasje. Because you were you too *drunk* to assess her flight risk."

links.text: "My background is in something else entirely. I engage in *neurology*..." -- he makes air quotes -- "... on a merely theoretical level. In fact, I should probably get going..."

links.text: What does *he* have to say for *himself*? He left you to catch the bullets!

links.text: "You look like a fucking clown, Harry. *Not* like a funny police officer, but like a real-life, full-time, pie-in-the-face, unicycle-riding circus employee."
